description: Generates a high-level architecture overview and a component diagram.
template: Based on the following problem description, provide a high-level architecture overview for the proposed solution. The response must be a compact JSON object with two keys: `design_md` and `diagrams`. `design_md` should contain a Markdown description of the architecture. `diagrams` should be an array containing a single object representing a Mermaid component diagram. The diagram object must have the keys `id`, `type` ('component'), `language` ('mermaid'), and `code` (the Mermaid diagram code).
constraints: `diagrams` array must contain one valid Mermaid component diagram object.
